entry.title: The Mechanical Muse
entry.quote: Machines are learning to write poetry. How should artificial intelligence alter our appreciation of art?

entry.title: Temperature Change by Country
entry.quote: Temperature change 1880–2019. Based on NASA GISTEMP data.

entry.title: Adding a Semantic Touch to Your Data Visualization
entry.quote: I don’t know how many of you are familiar with the Semantic Typography concept. It sounds abstract, and for a certain degree it is, but when we look at it, well, things become clearer. It happens when we overlap the visual and verbal communication, creating a sort of recursive image in which words behave in the same way as the meaning they drive (see above). Words that visualize meanings.

entry.title: Why we’re writing machine learning infrastructure in Go, not Python
entry.quote: Production machine learning is about more than just algorithms
